name: Geometric War LT
description:
You control the ship in the outer space and destroy all the alien ships. With the left joystick you control the flight direction of your ship and the right joystick controls and fire your weapon.

The game starts hard and it goes even harder - can you resist and get a lot of points?

If you love the old vector based arcade games of the 1980's such as Tempest, Vortex and Star-wars than this is the right game for you.

Features:
-Easy to learn
-1980's style old school vector graphics
-Save and load high score
-Very addictive gameplay
-Suitable for all ages
-Easy to learn but very hard to master
-Cool sounds and music
-Universal version for iPhone, iPod touch and iPad

This is the free version with a few ads - You can find the ad free version in the store.
